about_the_game:
This DLC contains music that was created using a neural network. Neuronet based on the name and other features of the game has transformed into this music.

11 tracks of wav format in genre in 8 bits:

1. Brazil_Simpleman ~ 2:36 min

2. Canada_Simpleman ~ 3:45 min

3. China_Simplman ~ 3:27 min

4. England_Simpleman ~ 2:45 min

5. France_Simpleman ~ 4:27 min

6. Germany_Simpleman ~ 3:03 min

7. Italia_Simpleman ~ 2:59 min

8. Japan_Simplman ~ 23:27 min

9. Russia_Simpleman ~ 3:26 min

10. USA_Simpleman ~ 4:36 min

11. Simple man gucci main ~ 5:00 min

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
